Subject: Need to configure Entra ID groups
Description:
Request to setup job to monitor the groups and alert on change:
AzRBAC Contributor-NPD
AzRBAC Contributor-PRD
AzRBAC Owner-Root
AzRBAC Contributor-Root
AzRBAC MSP-IaaS-Admin-NPD
AzRBAC MSP-PaaS-Admin-NPD
What_We_Know__c:
The customer would like a job setup that monitors 6 specific groups and alerts on changes.

Configure monitoring & alerting in StealthBits for Entra ID groups:
AzRBAC Contributor-NPD
AzRBAC Contributor-PRD
AzRBAC Owner-Root
AzRBAC Contributor-Root
AzRBAC MSP-IaaS-Admin-NPD
AzRBAC MSP-PaaS-Admin-NPD
Next_Steps__c: Review requirements and engage appropriate teams if needed.
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom
Customer wants a custom report that tracks changes to 6 specific groups in entra.


Resolution
Provided the customer with documents on how to build custom reports.
Referred to professional services as this is not a breakfix issue and this is not a report that comes built into the product.
